mapper.insert: insert into manual_sign (userId, signTime, signDesc, signTag) values (#{manualSign.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{manualSign.signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{manualSign.signDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 2);
mapper.select: select u.userId,u.username,d.departName,b.branchName from user u,depart d,branch b where u.userId=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and u.departId=d.departId and d.branchId=b.branchId
